ovdesc.p: This file is a setup file to have modifications in captured OFS message while playback.

desc.p: The name of the VERSION, in which this changes should occur. It's a multi-value field and Max 35 alphanumeric characters, min 3 is allowed to input.

The action, in which the changes should occur. It contains three values - ADD, REMOVE and REPLACE. User can select any one from the list. ADD denotes this field name and value will be added in the message. REMOVE denotes this field name with its value are removed. REPLACE denotes the field names will be changed and then the new field name with its value are included in the message. This operations will be taken place, during sequencer upload and the modified messages cannot able to see, because this will happen in the request sending to tSS at runtime. This three fields FIELD.NAME,FIELD.VALUE and ACTION is associated sub-value fields.

ID must be given as application name. This template is used to add or remove or replace the field names with its values in the captured messages,during sequencer upload. Max 35 alphanumeric characters are allowed to input.
The name of field name, that needs to be added (or) remove (or) replace. Max 35 and min 3 alphanumeric characters are allowed to input.

The value for the field specified or can attach a routine to return the value that needs to be added. In order to remove or replace a field name, no need to specify any FIELD.VALUE. This field value will be given, only for field name addition. Max 35 alphanumeric characters are allowed to input.
